title: Sausage and courgette lasagne
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons tomato pasta sauce', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '450g pork sausage', '2 courgettes, quartered and sliced', '450g ricotta cheese', '1 egg white', '225g grated mozzarella cheese', '60g grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '6 lasagne sheets, or more if needed', '475ml tomato pasta sauce, divided']
